product_name: Moving Comfort Flow Pants - Women's Regular - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A quintessential studio pant for yoga or pilates, the Moving Comfort Flow Pants feel great next to skin, smooth away imperfections and have an adjustable hem. Wide, contoured waistband fits great, and front and rear seams are offset to create a flattering look. Polyester and spandex blend moves with you, wicks moisture, dries quickly and feels very soft next to skin. UPF 50+ sun protection. Flatlock seams and a double crotch gusset decrease chafing. The Moving Comfort Flow Pants have a next-to-skin fit. Closeout.
short_description: A quintessential studio pant for yoga or pilates, the Moving Comfort Flow Pants feel great next to skin, smooth away imperfections and have an adjustable hem.
